title: Exper Dgn &Statis Methods
description: Introductory course on experimental design, hypothesis testing and basic statistical techniques commonly applied in biosciences research. Exercises based on statistical software packages.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 1553 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X53 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1554 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X54 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1564 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 1555 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X55 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D))
